original_text: for you are a people holy to the Lord your God. Out of all the peoples on the face of the earth, the Lord has chosen you to be his treasured possession.
korean_text: 너는 네 하나님 여호와의 성민이라 여호와께서 지상 만민 중에서 너를 택하여 자기 기업의 백성으로 삼으셨느니라

sentences.original_text: for you are a people holy to the Lord your God
Out of all the peoples on the face of the earth
